title: How to remove local files from Spotify - Quora

response.answer_text: You will have to Clear your Spotify Cache on Windows and Mac. Just follow the guide below. Close SpotifyNavigate to "%appdata%\Spotify\Users\" in your file browser.There should be a folder "username-user" - enter the folder.Delete the file named "local-files.bnk"Start Spotify

For Free users on your mobile phone just click on the gear icon then go to the very bottom and click on delete cache. For Premium users that have the download option available you can find that here as well where you can delete the downloaded files.
